title: Warm smoked Arctic char with prawns, girolles, pickled fennel and cucumber
description: A fresh and zingy dish to impress with. If you can’t get hold of Arctic char you could use salmon instead. Equipment: You will need a smoker bag.
ingredients: 2 Lebanese cucumbers, finely sliced using a mandolin
1 fennel bulb, finely sliced using a mandolin
extra virgin olive oil, for drizzling
150g/5½oz small Scottish girolles, washed in cold water and dried on kitchen paper
